channel.title: My new shop dc me
channel.description:
hey mopar users i just started whit my server :) now i tried to add a shop whit gs and custom gs now i made evrything compiled and logged in i used ghost shopkeerp (1699) but if i trade i get a connection error and if i talk there is comming not a shop screen
can someone say what i must eddit ? pleas
ps : if u need my script say it bc i relly need the shop working :P

item.title: My new shop dc me
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:6, topic:256938”]im guessing when he trades the shop since i tryed it and it did what he is saying but then i deleted it.[/quote]He added a ‘custom item’. Maybe that’s why it didn’t work for you? You don’t have his client?

Read full topic
